name: github-pr-comment
description: Publish a comment on a GitHub pull request.
author: SOUTHWORKS

inputs.name: userToken
inputs.label: User Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user token to initiate the connection

inputs.name: repository
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full name of the repository where you want to make the comment(owner/repository)

inputs.name: prNumber
inputs.label: Pull Request Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pull request to make a comment on

inputs.name: extension
inputs.label: Files extension
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the files extension. Eg: txt

inputs.name: getSubFolders
inputs.label: Use sub-folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Get all the .json files including the ones in sub-folders
